original: He made up a pretext for a fight with me.

original: Don't use this faucet.
translated: N'utilise pas ce robinet.

original: Tom and Mary just do what they want.
translated: Tom et Marie ne font que ce qu'ils veulent.

original: I want to bring my family here.
translated: Je veux amener ma famille ici.

original: Google doesn't know everything.
translated: Google ne sait pas tout.

original: He's got the bad habit of picking his nose.
translated: Il a la manie de se curer le nez.

original: What is the difference between A and B?
translated: Quelle est la différence entre A et B ?

original: Hurry up, or you'll miss the train.
translated: Dépêchez-vous, ou vous manquerez le train.

original: You have little to gain and much to lose.
translated: Vous avez peu à gagner et beaucoup à perdre.

original: Mary carries pepper spray in her purse.
translated: Mary transporte un spray au poivre dans son sac.

original: I felt dirty after helping him.
translated: Je me suis senti sale de l'avoir aidé.

original: How I wish I had a car.
translated: Comme j'aurais espéré avoir une voiture.

original: Why don't you put some clothes on?
translated: Et si tu mettais des vêtements ?

original: You don't seem too worried.
translated: Tu ne sembles pas trop soucieux.

original: I don't mind if it's hot.
translated: Ça ne me dérange pas qu'il fasse chaud.

original: Let's walk to the lake.
translated: Marchons jusqu'au lac.

original: These are the words to say, to say goodbye.
translated: Ce sont les mots à dire pour dire au revoir.

original: Do you know what Tom did?
translated: Sais-tu ce que Tom a fait ?

original: He is going to run for mayor.
translated: Il va se présenter aux élections municipales.

original: You explained that well.
translated: Tu as bien expliqué ça.

original: Tom seems sincere.
translated: Tom semble sincère.

original: Close!
translated: Pas loin !

original: Look over the contract well, before you sign it.
translated: Regarde bien le contrat avant de le signer.

original: I'm the same age as Tom and Mary are.
translated: J'ai le même âge que Tom et Mary.

original: I put the circular in the mail box.
translated: J'ai mis la circulaire dans la boîte aux lettres.

original: He had such a bad headache that he had to cancel the meeting.
translated: Il avait un tel mal de tête qu'il a dû annuler la réunion.

original: He told me about it.
translated: Il me l'a dit.

original: The food was decent.
translated: La nourriture était correcte.

original: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for the rest of his life.
translated: Donne un poisson à un homme, il mangera un jour. Apprends-lui à pêcher, il mangera toute sa vie.

original: I'm a little taller than you.
translated: Je suis un peu plus grand que vous.

original: Ultraviolet rays are harmful to us.
translated: Les rayons ultraviolets nous sont nuisibles.

original: They're predicting rain.
translated: Ils prévoient de la pluie.

original: Can you explain your answer?
translated: Pouvez-vous justifier votre réponse ?

original: I always wear a helmet when I ride my bicycle.
translated: Je porte toujours un casque quand je conduis mon vélo.

original: I just wanted to be sure.
translated: Je souhaitais seulement être sûr.

original: We surrendered.
translated: Nous nous sommes rendues.
